## Steps to reproduce

[CaseSensitivityTest.zip](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/files/351046/CaseSensitivityTest.zip)
1. `Inovke-Pester` on the attached zip
## Expected behavior

The tests should pass
## Actual behavior

On Linux the `import-module` with the module name mis-cased fails.
